# Pano Publisher

Pano Publisher is a local-first web application for uploading individual 360° photo spheres to Google Maps and Google Street View.

## Purpose
- Upload standalone 360° photos (photo spheres) to Google Street View
- Fill the gap left by the discontinued Google Street View mobile app
- Focus on image uploads only

## Key Characteristics
- Local-first processing in the browser
- No cloud storage of images between the user and Google
- No proprietary user accounts
- Uses Google account only for publishing via Google APIs
- Free to use
- Open source
- Modern, clean and fast user interface

## Limitations
- No video uploads
- No connected panoramas
- No street-level imagery from video footage

## Important Pages
- /        Main application
- /privacy Privacy policy
